attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the Late Kick Off regional football program currently broadcasting on BBC1 to show Welsh teams that are in the Championship, currently two top six football teams Swansea and Cardiff are completely ignored. 

The BBC is a national broadcaster and by not having the Welsh teams in the show, devalues the program.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
